name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring back Google search result counter and display indexed pages

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This free Google Chrome extension brings back the number of results and indexed pages on Google SERP.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
